properties.Description: 625 gallons of unspecified corrosive liquid released from tank car because of improper handling by manufacturer on-site.
1,000 pounds of polymeric beads (that can produce flammable vapor) were spilled after a puncture in a BNSF trailer.
700 gallons of  hydrochloric acid solution released from CSX tank car in rail yard; faulty liner suspected cause. **
800 gallons of an unspecified corrosive liquid leaked through a hole in a rubber tank car liner and burned a hole in the car; damage was $34,000.
25,000 pounds of unspecified hazardous materials spilled along the tracks because of a door leak.
1,234 gallons of sulfuric acid spilled by chemical company at CN facility while loading.
200 gallons of diesel fuel leaked from BNSF tank car after valve was left open. **

properties.Railroad: C C P Railroad Holding Inc
properties.Description: 14,000 gallons of unspecified flammable liquid released when a CN tank car was punctured; damage was $91,500.
Factory evacuated after a release of unspecified flammable liquid from a stopped CN train. * **
1,000 pounds of polymeric beads (that can produce flammable vapor) spilled after improper handling at BNSF facility. **

properties.Railroad: The Belt Railway Company Of Chicago
properties.Description: Slow drip from deteriorated equipment released (styrene monomer) an explosive liquid from Chicago Belt Railway train car. Damage was $25,500.

properties.Railroad: The Belt Railway Company Of Chicago
properties.Description: 3,000 pounds of ammonium nitrate fertilizer spilled during a loading accident; damage was $26,500
Loose plugs on an EJ&E (now CN) tank car valve caused the release of highly flammable liquid (hexene) in rail yard. * **
Flammable gas (ethylene) leaking from EJ&E (now CN) train. * **
508 gallons of petroleum product spilled from leaky Indiana Harbor Belt RR tank car Rail yard was cleared and box alarm called in to fire department. **
